text: Hagi Sameria kumapina ufreta ne'zankura hakosinagi, zamaga tonto higeno ne'zana kumamofo agu'afina omne'neankita ufresuta ufrigahune. Hagi ama anante'ma manisunana ana zanke huta frigahune. E'ina hu'negu otinketa Siria vahe'mo'zama seli nonkuma'ma eme ante'za mani'nafi vanunke'zama tahe frisazana knare hugahie. Hagi ontahe'zama tatresazana knare hugahie.
